signals.signal: Ecovadis hosting Sustain 2026 event Mar 2-3 in Paris. Major procurement/sustainability leaders attending. Company actively publishing thought leadership.
signals.recommendation: Use Sustain 2026 as conversation point in Wed pilot kickoff. Ask who's attending, offer to connect.

signals.signal: Reddit posts (Mar 2025) mention 'soft layoffs' at Neo Financial. Company denies 'structured layoffs' but admits 'driven efficiencies'.
signals.recommendation: Validate budget before investing more time. Ask direct questions about hiring freeze/budget availability.

signals.signal: Fleetio very active - exhibiting at NAFA, GFX, Work Truck Week, CONEXPO in 2026. Publishing operational best practices content. Healthy growth signals.
signals.recommendation: Solid prospect. Thu meeting should focus on their scaling challenges.

signals.signal: EvenUp actively expanding - launched Communication Agents + Next-Gen AI Drafts Suite, presenting at National Trial Lawyers Summit 2026, actively hiring for revenue kickoff. $1B valuation company.
signals.recommendation: Re-engage immediately. 105 days stalled on $50K pilot is too long for a company this hot. They're in growth mode and spending on tools.

signals.signal: Neo Financial raised $650M+ total funding. Ranked #1 on Canada's Top Growing Companies 3 years running. Deloitte Enterprise Industry Leaders #1 (2025).
signals.recommendation: Strong company validation. Push for trial start - this is a high-quality logo worth pursuing.

signals.signal: No specific recent news found. Company doing sustainability ratings - stable but no major funding/growth signals.
signals.recommendation: Proceed with pilot as planned. Monitor for competitive pressure from Replit mentioned in notes.

signals.signal: 61 days in contracting stage with no activity. Budget approved per notes, waiting for product team owner.
signals.recommendation: Push Georgiy for contract signature. 61 days in contracting is a red flag - deals die here.

signals.title: VP of Product
signals.signal: New VP of Product at 360Learning (L&D/LMS company). 3 months in role. L&D platforms are perfect Reforge fit for product team training.
signals.recommendation: Outreach to Sarah - new in role, likely building out product team capabilities. L&D angle is strong.

signals.title: VP, Go-to-Market (GTM)
signals.signal: New VP GTM at FriendliAI (AI infrastructure company). Building GTM function. SF-based, 2nd degree connection.
signals.recommendation: Outreach to Ryan - new GTM leader at AI company likely needs to upskill team fast.

emailSignals.note: No new Reforge-related emails in last 2 days
